result.eng: Ráidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ga: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.html: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na GaeltachtaRáidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na GaeltaċtaRáidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.

result.eng: It depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ga: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.orig: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.html: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag braṫ ar a ṁinice a ċastar na haṁráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.
